short_summary: Precision Driver Training to enable CAF personnel to practice and maintain the necessary skills and to safely function on a day-to-day basis
description: This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is for a qualified service provider with resources, instructor and personnel to support the provision of Precision Driver Training.
full_summary:
# Precision Driver Training Contract Tender

**Contract Title**
The Precision Driver Training contract is a request for a Standing Offer (RFSO) for a qualified service provider to provide precision driver training to Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) personnel.

## Tender Details
| **Item** | **Details** |
| :------ | :---------- |
| **Contract Title (English)** | Precision Driver Training |
| **Contract Title (French)** | Formation de conduite de précision |
| **Reference Number** | cb-5681-17016582 |
| **Amendment Number** | 1 |
| **Solicitation Number** | W6399-23-LN17/A |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-05-18 |
| **Tender Closing Date and Time** | 2023-06-19T14:00:00 |
| **Amendment Date** | 2023-06-19 |

## Contract Description
This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is for a qualified service provider with the necessary resources, instructors, and personnel to support the provision of precision driver training to enable CAF personnel to practice and maintain the skills necessary to safely perform their duties on a day-to-day basis.

### Contract Information

* **UNSPSC Code** | 86100000 | Vocational Training
* **Trade Agreements** | Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents
* **Regions of Opportunity** | North America
* **Regions of Delivery** | United States of America, Canada
* **Contracting Entity** | Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address**
  * Address Line | 101 Colonel By Drive
  * City | Ottawa
  * Province | Ontario
  * Postal Code | K1A 0K2
  * Country | Canada

## Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information

In case of any inquiries or clarification on the tender, please contact:

* **Name** | Austin Sanford
* **Email** | Austin.Sanford@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone** | (613) 993-6864
